/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The roads are teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings that line the roads are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens used to capture it, adding a unique perspective to the urban landscape.
